hasMember:

  • Generated Summary: Roll left and right - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Supervision or touching assistance - Helper provides verbal cues and/or touching/steadying and/or contact guard assistance as person completes activity. Assistance may be provided throughout the activity or intermittently.
  • Generated Summary: Sit to lying - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Supervision or touching assistance - Helper provides verbal cues and/or touching/steadying and/or contact guard assistance as person completes activity. Assistance may be provided throughout the activity or intermittently.
  • Generated Summary: Lying to sitting on side of bed - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.
  • Generated Summary: Sit to stand - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.
  • Generated Summary: Chair/bed-to-chair transfer - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.
  • Generated Summary: Toilet transfer - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.
  • Generated Summary: Walk 10 feet - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Dependent - Helper does all of the effort. Person does none of the effort to complete the activity. Or, the assistance of 2 or more helpers is required for the person to complete the activity.
  • Generated Summary: Walk 50 feet with two turns - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Dependent - Helper does all of the effort. Person does none of the effort to complete the activity. Or, the assistance of 2 or more helpers is required for the person to complete the activity.
  • Generated Summary: Walk 150 feet - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]; effective: Jan 14, 2020, 1:00:00 PM; Dependent - Helper does all of the effort. Person does none of the effort to complete the activity. Or, the assistance of 2 or more helpers is required for the person to complete the activity.
